    • getClassesDir

      public static File getClassesDir(Class<?> anyClassInClassesDir)
      Get absolute 'classes' directory where class is located.

      If class is part of a jar file null is returned.

      Parameters:
      anyClassInClassesDir - class in 'classes' directory
      Returns:
      'classes' directory or null if class is not located there

    • retrieveLoadedPackageNames

      public static void retrieveLoadedPackageNames()
      Retrieve and sort names of loaded packages.

      Internally caches loaded package names, so subsequent calls of getLoadedPackageNames() do not call Reflection method to get packages).

    • getLoadedPackageNames

      public static Collection<String> getLoadedPackageNames()
      Get names of loaded packages in alphabetical order - retrieve loaded packages only on first call.
      Returns:
      sorted list of names of currently loaded packages

    • loadInnerClass

      public static Class<?> loadInnerClass(String innerClassName, Class<?> outerClass) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Load inner class of given class.

      Once loaded classes using this method are cached internally, so subsequent calls of this method with same parameters do not load class again.

      Parameters:
      innerClassName - inner class name
      outerClass - outer class
      Returns:
      class object found
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if class could not be found or parameters are null or empty

    • loadClass

      public static Class<?> loadClass(String className) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Load class by qualified or simple name including caching of already loaded and non-loadable classes.

      If name is not qualified the first class of given name found in any of the loaded packages will be returned.

      Once loaded classes using this method are cached internally, so subsequent calls of this method with same parameter do not load class again. If any class could not be loaded name will also be cached to avoid subsequent unsuccessful load tries.

      Parameters:
      className - qualified or simple class name
      Returns:
      class object
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if no class could be found for given name
